UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile within the DEFIT 2026 application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

registrationDate.description: The date and time the user registered.

isSoldier.description: Indicates if the user is a U.S. Army Reserve Soldier.

rank.description: The rank of the Soldier (if applicable).

unit.description: The unit of the Soldier (if applicable).

teamName.description: The user's team name for team-based competitions.

availableCardio.description: A list of cardio equipment the user has access to.

avatarUrl.description: The URL of the user's profile picture, stored as a data URI.

WorkoutLog.title: WorkoutLog
WorkoutLog.description: Represents a single workout log entry for a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the WorkoutLog entity.

week.description: The challenge week number for this log.

resistanceLbs.description: Pounds lifted during Strength and Resistance workout.

cardioMilesElliptical.description: Miles on elliptical during cardio workout.

cardioMilesRowing.description: Miles on rowing machine during cardio workout.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. The path is based on the user's Firebase UID, ensuring straightforward ownership-based security rules.

params.name: userProfileId
params.description: The Firebase UID of the user. It represents the unique identifier for each user profile.

definition.description: Stores all workout log entries for all users. This allows for global queries for leaderboards.

params.name: workoutLogId
params.description: The unique ID of the workout log entry.
